member.name: T:MT264SlideShow1.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:MT264SlideShow1.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MT264SlideShow1.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

members.member: Preconditions: The text needs to be loaded. Postconditions: The size of the font has been increased by 4
Preconditions: None. Postconditions: Takes the current images and applies it to the print preview page, which is what the user want to print.

member.name: M:MT264SlideShow1.Slide.#ctor
member.summary: A new instance of Slide is created with ImageLocation and Text set to the empty string.

member.name: M:MT264SlideShow1.Slide.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: A new instance of Slide is created with ImageLocation and Text set to loc and desc respectively.

member.name: M:MT264SlideShow1.SlideShowAdmin.#ctor
member.summary: An instance of SlideShowAdmin is created with the list of slides set to a new empty list of slides and Current set to 0.

member.name: P:MT264SlideShow1.SlideShowAdmin.CurrentImage
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: If the list of slides is not empty, an attempt is made to return the image from the current slide. If the list is empty or the attempt fails, Nothing is returned.

member.name: P:MT264SlideShow1.SlideShowAdmin.CurrentText
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: The text from the current slide is returned. If the list of slides is empty then the empty string is returned.

member.name: M:MT264SlideShow1.SlideShowAdmin.firstSlide
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: Current is set to 0.

member.name: M:MT264SlideShow1.SlideShowAdmin.nextSlide
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: If Current + 1 is less than the number of slides, Current is incremented by 1. Otherwise nothing is done.

member.name: M:MT264SlideShow1.SlideShowAdmin.previousSlide
member.summary: Preconditions: none Postconditions: If Current is greater than zero then Current is decremented by 1. Otherwise nothing is done.

member.name: M:MT264SlideShow1.SlideShowAdmin.drawSlide(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Preconditions: CurrentImage is not Nothing. Postconditions: CurrentImage is drawn on g. For further details, see Q3(a).

members.member:
Preconditions: none Postconditions: An attempt is made to open the slide show found at filename. If successful, Current is set to 0. If the attempt fails, an exception is thrown.
]
